AI Description: Intel oneAPI Math Kernel Library (oneMKL) is a high-performance mathematical function library that provides optimized math routines for scientific, engineering, and machine learning applications. It offers highly optimized, thread-safe, and vectorized functions across various domains such as linear algebra, fast Fourier transforms, statistical analysis, and more.
Core Features: High-Performance Mathematical Function Library, Optimized Math Routines For Scientific, Engineering, & Machine Learning Applications, Thread-Safe & Vectorized Functions, Supports Linear Algebra, Fast Fourier Transforms, Statistical Analysis, & More
General Tags: Math Library, High Performance Computing, Optimized Functions, Scientific Computing
